caption: nhl.com
description: Hitch: "You know what? There's talk of being a professional and then there's acting professional, and Greg Pateryn, he talks the talk and walks the walk."
message:
Every game this season, Greg Pateryn would put on a suit and sit in a press box while watching his peers go to work. Not an easy thing for any player to do.

Then he led all Stars in ice time in the win on Friday night.
name: Dallas Stars

message: November 18 at home against the Oilers. That's game number 20 for the Stars, and if we're in a playoff spot then (we are now), all is going according to Hitch's plan as detailed in this KIA Victory Quote.
name: Dallas Stars

message: Kari Lehtonen carried the Stars to victory in this low-scoring affair, and Radulov... well, just watch.
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: The goaltender stopped 29 shots to lead the Stars to a 2-1 win over the Flames for their second road win.
message: The Stars now have the number one ranked power play in the NHL and the number two ranked penalty kill.
name: Dallas Stars

message: STARS WIN!!! We're back in the win column with another stellar performance from our special teams and a clutch Kari Lehtonen in net. #GoStars
name: Dallas Stars

message: Stand tall, Kari.
name: Dallas Stars

message: Friday Night Hockey! The puck has dropped in Canadian Cowtown and we're underway for Stars vs. Flames!
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: Following a difficult loss to Edmonton on Thursday, Dallas faces another stiff test tonight.
message: If you have the second ranked power play and the third ranked penalty kill in the NHL, you should be better than 5-5-0, which is where the Stars sit through 10 games. Point number four in Burnside's article addresses this.
name: Dallas Stars

message:
Want to bring some Victory Green to United Center? Enter the Advance Auto Parts Fly Away Sweepstakes to win a round trip for 2 to Chicago for Stars vs. Blackhawks on Nov. 30!

 ✈️ www.nhl.com/stars/fans/advance-auto-parts
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: Kari Lehtonen is scheduled to start in goal as the Stars seek their second road win of the season
message: More hockey! A short flight, a short rest, and the boys are in Calgary for an 8:00 PM game against the Flames tonight.
name: Dallas Stars

message: "They're struggling with the 'winning hockey' thing on the road. They did enough good things to win, but they did not win." We'll let Razor break this one down for you in typical Razor fashion.
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: The Stars have less than 24 hours to ruminate on what might have been in a game where they led 4-3 in the third period.
message: The Stars scored 3 power play goals and were a perfect 3-for-3 on the penalty kill, but that wasn't enough. With a quick turnaround today in Calgary, the Stars will have to turn the page swiftly.
name: Dallas Stars

message: Strong special teams weren't enough to get the W tonight, and the Stars fall short in a back-and-forth affair. We're right back at it in Calgary tomorrow night.
name: Dallas Stars

message: Alexander Radulov's one-timer is so hard it knocked him off his own skates.
name: Dallas Stars

message: We're ready. The puck has dropped from Edmonton and Stars vs. Oilers is underway!
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: Both the Stars and Oilers are looking for some offensive production in tonight's game.
message: Ritchie will be playing with Benn and Seguin. See what the rest of the lineup looks like as Hitch did some tinkering with his forward lines before tonight's game against the Oilers.
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: "We're not bringing in two rookies. We're bringing in two veterans who can help us."
message: Greg Pateryn and Jamie Oleksiak return to the lineup tonight, and Hitch says Stephen Johns (who is dealing with concussion-like symptoms) was feeling much better today.
name: Dallas Stars

message: 17-year old Savanna Roulette was raising money for the National Multiple Sclerosis Society. When Jamie Benn, an ambassador for the MS Society, caught wind of this, he decided to step in and help.
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: Jamie Oleksiak and Greg Pateryn both could be in on defense as Dallas continues its five-game trip.
message: IT'S GAME DAY! Bishop is in, Johns is out, and Dallas will look to start up another win streak tonight in Edmonton.
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: Plagued by injuries in Edmonton, the forward is off to a strong start in his first season with Dallas.
message: When the Stars signed Tyler Pitlick on the first day of free agency this summer, it didn't generate a lot of fanfare. But early in the season, the move is paying dividends.
name: Dallas Stars

message: Hitch: "If you coached in this business worried about conflict, you wouldn't last five minutes."
name: Dallas Stars

message: "The only thing that matters is the next two points." Putting last night behind him, Ben Bishop is ready for his next start tomorrow in Edmonton.
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: The first 300 tickets purchased for each night will include a limited edition co-branded Stars hat, featuring your school's logo and official colors.
message: Show your Texas school pride this season at one of our College Spirit Nights! You'll receive discounted tickets and a custom Stars hat with your school's logo.
name: Dallas Stars

message: The Stars four-game win streak came to an end on Tuesday night, but Jamie Benn tallied a goal and two assists, his third straight three-point performance on the road.
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: Stephen Johns left the game with concussion symptoms after a collision with Matt Duchene.
message: Benn and Seguin continue to produce offensively, but the Stars need production from the rest of the lineup.
name: Dallas Stars

message: Ben Bishop: "There was no reason for me to come out. I guess that's the coach's decision... I'm not very happy with the decision."
name: Dallas Stars

message: Hitch on pulling Ben Bishop: "It has nothing to do with Ben Bishop, it has to do with, 'Wake up. Let's get playing.' Which is exactly what we did."
name: Dallas Stars

message: Not the result we wanted, but there's no quit in this team. A third period push wasn't enough as the Stars fall to the Avalanche 5-3. Next stop on the road trip is in Edmonton on Thursday.
name: Dallas Stars

message: Let's keep it rolling on the road. Stars vs. Avs is underway as the boys are looking for their fifth straight win!
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: Dallas seeks its fifth straight victory and the eighth in its past nine meetings with the Avs.
message: The best way to suck the life out of a team that seems to be vulnerable is to come hard out of the gate, especially on the road. Scoring early will be on the Stars minds tonight.
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: Life on the road can be tough, but the next eleven days will be a good opportunity for a new Stars team to form a bond.
message: Methot and Lehtonen are both expecting children in the coming weeks. Older players spend most of their time with their families. The next eleven days will give these 23 players plenty of time to really get to know each other.
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: Dallas puts its four-game win streak on the line to begin the first long road trip of the season.
message: IT'S GAME DAY! Let's make it five in a row. The Stars kick off their long road trip tonight in Colorado with a matchup against the Avalanche.
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: The Stars will play Colorado, Edmonton, Calgary, Vancouver and Winnipeg on the trip.
message: Time to hit the road. The Stars are about to kick off a 5-game, 11-day road trip that will be the first real test for this team. Bishop will start the next two games, and Lehtonen will play Friday in Calgary.
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: Dallas has a big test coming up with a five-game road swing through Western Canada.
message: After winning four straight, the Dallas Stars make their first appearance in Scott Burnside's Terrific 10.
name: Dallas Stars

message: The way he's been playing, the goals were bound to come for Tyler Pitlick. He tallied his first two as a Dallas Star for our Budweiser Red Light Celly of the Week! 🚨
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: Ever wanted to live the life of a Dallas Stars player? Now you can.
message: Spend four days living like an NHL pro and playing alongside Dallas Stars legends at our Alumni Fantasy Camp from February 13-16!
name: Dallas Stars

message: Dan Hamhuis gives a ton of credit to Ben Bishop's ability to play the puck. The Stars are always on the man advantage with Ben Bishop in net, as stated in this KIA Victory Quote!
name: Dallas Stars

message: Benn's bullet, Pitlick's first two goals as a Dallas Star and Seguin's snipe. Highlights from our fourth straight win.
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: Hitch called Pitlick, Faksa and Roussel the best forward line of any that went on the ice for either team.
message: Eight games into the season, the Stars have their first four-game win streak. Dallas did not win four straight at any point last season.
name: Dallas Stars

message: STARS WIN!!! That's four wins in a row for your Dallas Stars, and we're now 5-3-0 on the season!
name: Dallas Stars

message: Tyler Pitlick's first goal as a Dallas Star is a memorable one for sure (he's got two so far tonight).
name: Dallas Stars

message: Watching these two all season is going to be a LOT of fun.
name: Dallas Stars

message: Brenden Morrow just dropped the puck on the first Reunion Night this season and Stars vs. Hurricanes is underway!
name: Dallas Stars

message: Tonight is Brenden Morrow's Reunion Night at AAC! Arrive early as there will be a pre-game ceremony with the former Stars Captain, and he will be signing autographs outside section 101 during the first intermission!
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: Julius Honka will slot back into the lineup and Jamie Oleksiak will come out.
message: Ben Bishop will make his sixth straight start, bringing a 4-1 record, 1.93 GAA and .929 SV% into tonight's game.
name: Dallas Stars

message: The Stars currently rank first in the NHL in combined penalty kill (3rd, 88.9%) and power play (T-5th, 28.6%) percentage. Through six games, special teams have seen a huge improvement from last season.
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: Dallas has won three straight entering Saturday's matchup with the Hurricanes.
message: IT'S GAME DAY! The Stars are back at home looking for their fourth win in a row tonight as they take on the Hurricanes at 7:00 PM.
name: Dallas Stars

message:
Radulov just got his Texas drivers license. After this, he's thinking about getting one for a helicopter. Episode 2 of our 'Open Ice' series is now up on our Official YouTube channel! Watch via the link below:

🎥 www.youtube.com/watch?v=yLP30pfievI
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: The former captain will be honored during Saturday's game as part of our 25th Anniversary Reunion Nights.
message: With Brenden Morrow's Reunion Night scheduled for tomorrow, Scott Burnside caught up with the Stars legend to discuss his career in Dallas and making Texas home.
name: Dallas Stars

message: From playing street hockey with your friends to playing in the NHL, scoring goals is just flat out fun. Stephen Johns plans on doing this for a long time, as mentioned in this KIA Victory Quote!
name: Dallas Stars

message: The Coyotes were hungry, desperate even, for their first win of the season, but the Stars were up for the challenge. Highlights from last night's 5-4 win.
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: Tyler Seguin provided the heroics Thursday as Dallas earned its first road win against the reeling Desert Dogs.
message: Ladies and gentlemen, that's a winning streak right there.
name: Dallas Stars

message: COMING IN HOT!
name: Dallas Stars

message: STARS WIN!!! That's three wins in a row for Dallas and the goals are starting to come, including a pair from Tyler Seguin tonight! Ben Bishop was a rock in net as well.
name: Dallas Stars

message: Slick, smooth, sneaky.... Whatever you want to call it, this goal from Jamie Benn was pretty.
name: Dallas Stars

message: We're going for our third straight win tonight. Stay up with us for what should be a tense rematch in the desert as Stars vs. Coyotes is underway!
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: A third straight Dallas victory tonight would be its first on the road this season.
message: Grab a cup of joe and get ready for Bishop vs. Hill part 2. Puck drops at 9:00 PM tonight from Arizona. Here are 5 things to watch for in tonight's rematch.
name: Dallas Stars

message: Hitch has made it clear that Honka coming out and Oleksiak coming in doesn't have to do with poor play, but it's the need to rotate guys in and out of the lineup.
name: Dallas Stars

message:
"This is awkward..."

Be on the lookout for episode 2 of our in-depth, behind-the-scenes 'Open Ice' feature tomorrow!
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: Ben Bishop to start in goal as Dallas seeks its first road win of the season.
message: Stars vs. Coyotes. Round 2. We'll look for the home-and-home sweep in Arizona tonight at 9:00 PM.
name: Dallas Stars

description: Limited Edition of 250 Dallas Stars Brenden Morrow Bobbleheads For Sale Saturday!  First 100 will be released at 10:00 a.m. at our Victory Park Location! Limit 1 Per Customer! #Gostars
name: Dallas Stars

message:
Enter the Advance Auto Parts Fly Away Sweepstakes to win a round trip for 2 to Chicago for Stars vs. Blackhawks on Nov. 30!

✈️  www.nhl.com/stars/fans/advance-auto-parts
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: Download and listen to the latest episode of Burnside Chats, an official Dallas Stars podcast, hosted by Scott Burnside
message: The NHL is a young league, and it's only getting younger. The best players on some teams can't even go out and get a beer. But are they ready to lead an NHL team? Tune in to episode 3 of 'Burnside Chats'.
name: Dallas Stars

message:
This Saturday is our first Reunion Night, and we're starting off with Brenden Morrow! We'll have a pre-game ceremony featuring Morrow himself, an autograph session and more!

BUY TICKETS: http://bit.ly/2x634Qm
name: Dallas Stars

message: We're 6 games into an 82 game season, and while Ben Bishop has turned in some pretty impressive performances so far, he's still figuring out who's who in this KIA Victory Quote.
name: Dallas Stars

message: Ben Bishop is now 3-1 with a 1.49 GAA and .944 save percentage. He was a rock in net during the third period to secure the win for Dallas last night.
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: Dallas got to .500 with Tuesday's 3-1 victory, but it didn't come without some tense moments.
message: The Stars came away from last night's game with two points, but if they want the same result in Arizona on Thursday, they'll have to play better than that.
name: Dallas Stars

message: STARS WIN!!! After a slow start, the boys seem to have hit their stride and we're back at .500. We're in Arizona for a rematch on Thursday.
name: Dallas Stars

message: Stars vs. Coyotes is underway! #GoStars
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: Oleksiak, Pateryn and Smith are the expected scratches for tonight's game.
message: The Stars will send Ben Bishop out for his fourth straight start. Adin Hill, who is making his NHL debut, will get the nod for the Coyotes.
name: Dallas Stars

message: Former Dallas Star Jason Demers is back in Dallas, and he and the Coyotes are hungry for their first win of the season.
name: Dallas Stars

message:
"I don't think you can win in the West without having defenseman that can control the hockey game."

For Hitch, it's all about the defense.
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: Arizona, which has yet to earn a victory this season, hasn't won in Dallas since 2012.
message: Bring on the Coyotes. The Stars open a home-and-home series against Arizona tonight at AAC.
name: Dallas Stars

message: Doing what they can, when they can. After practice this morning, a couple of the guys visited Children’s Medical Center Plano to spend some time with the kids there.
name: Dallas Stars

message: This is how you celebrate a goal. Alexander Radulov's priceless reaction was last week's Budweiser Celly of the Week!
name: Dallas Stars

message: "It's not fun to put work in ahead of skill, it's not fun at all. But that has to be imperative in your environment if you're going to be successful."
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: Valeri Nichushkin is on a good run in the KHL, with eight points in his past seven games for CSKA Moscow.
message: Miro Heiskanen is looking good in Finland, putting up three points in three games after missing the first eleven games of the season due to a concussion.
name: Dallas Stars

message: Big hits and tons of offensive fire power. Dak Prescott is clearly a fan of Dallas Stars hockey.
name: Dallas Stars

message:
"I like when he steps up and does something like that." 

Jamie Benn had nothing but good things to say about Tyler Seguin getting in his first NHL fight in this KIA Victory Quote.
name: Dallas Stars

message: 60 minutes of solid, Dallas Stars hockey. Highlights from last night's win.
name: Dallas Stars

message: "He FOUGHT Patrik Nemeth. Eleven days ago they were teammates. Tonight? Who cares. Let's get into it, it's a dust up."
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: The Stars have scored a power play goal in all five of their games so far this season.
message: Tyler Seguin did it all Saturday night against the Avs, and the Stars were able to shut Colorado down late in the game to secure their second win.
name: Dallas Stars

message: "I'll score for you. I'll make sure it's for you." Jamie Benn is a man of his word and we're proud to call him our Captain.
name: Dallas Stars

message: STARS WIN!!! Seguin dropped the gloves for his first career fight, Jamie Benn led the way with the first goal of the night, and the Stars defeat the Avs, 3-1!
name: Dallas Stars

message: A divisional game at home. You want to win them all, but THESE are the ones you really want to win. Stars vs. Avs is underway!
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: After missing the past two games with a groin injury, the defenseman should be paired with Stephen Johns.
message: Hamhuis is in, Oleksiak is out, and Methot will be paired up with Klingberg on the top defense pair tonight.
name: Dallas Stars

message: Don't sleep on the Avs. That's Hitch's message to the guys ahead of tonight's game.
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: The top line of Benn, Seguin and Radulov have a combined zero even-strength goals.
message: The Avalanche gave new meaning to the word 'bad' last season, but they currently sit atop the Central Division at 4-1-0.
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: The Stars have scored on the power play in all four games this season.
message: The Stars will look to cool off a hot Avalanche team who have won three straight.
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: Hitchcock also did some juggling of his forward lines as well.
message: Marc Methot and John Klingberg are expected to play together on Saturday vs. the Avs.
name: Dallas Stars

message:
Home ice has always been kind to us. Be there as we get back on track tomorrow night at AAC for Stars vs. Avs!

TICKETS: bit.ly/2ymLGtG
name: Dallas Stars

message: That first period was the best 20 minutes of hockey we've played all season. The second period, not so much. Consistency is key moving forward.
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: The Stars' fast start yields little in the way of a positive note in the Music City as the Preds roll 4-1.
message: The Stars are playing okay right now, but okay isn't nearly good enough in this league.
name: Dallas Stars

message: It was a tough game from both teams. That's life in the Central Division. The Avs come to town for our next game on Saturday.
name: Dallas Stars

message: That net front presence from both Benn and Spezza. We like Hitch hockey.
name: Dallas Stars

message: The puck has dropped and we're underway from Nashville!
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: With his next victory, Ken Hitchcock will move into third on the all-time coaching wins list.
message: Yes, more of the same, please. The Stars will roll out the same lineup as on Tuesday with Bishop in goal.
name: Dallas Stars

message: "I think we're forging an identity and that's what we want to see." These first few games are important in that they dictate the tone for the rest of the season. What will this Dallas Stars team look like?
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: Both the Stars and Predators are coming off their first victories of the season.
message: After a sound game on Tuesday, the Stars will look for the same effort tonight in Nashville.
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: The Dallas head coach is likely to roll with the same group at Nashville on Thursday.
message:
"I liked our lines. I liked the defense pairs. I liked the goalie. I liked every part of it." 

If it ain't broke don't fix it.
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: The 1999 Cup champion with the Stars is relishing his post-playing career in player development.
message: For our 25th Anniversary, we'll be posting player updates on former Dallas Stars greats. See what Jamie Langenbrunner has been up to.
name: Dallas Stars

message: Highlights from last night's 4-2 win over the Red Wings.
name: Dallas Stars

message: There's nothing like getting your first win as a Dallas Star in front of the home crowd.
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: Tuesday might not have been a must-win for Dallas, but it couldn't have come at a better time.
message: The win last night is great, but what's important is that Hitchcock feels that the Stars looked like the kind of team he imagined it might become.
name: Dallas Stars

message: With a captain like Jamie Benn and a coach like Hitch, the Stars are in good hands.
name: Dallas Stars

message: STARS WIN!!! Now that's more like it. A solid effort from the boys tonight, with goals from Klingberg, Seguin, Janmark and Hanzal.
name: Dallas Stars

message: Mattias Janmark deserves a big bear hug from Radulov after scoring a goal like this.
name: Dallas Stars

message: Thanks for the good times, Dales.
name: Dallas Stars

message: Klinger with the bank shot!
name: Dallas Stars

message: It's been two full seasons and he's been on three different teams since leaving the Stars, but Trevor Daley finally makes his return back to Dallas. Stars vs. Red Wings is underway!
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: Ben Bishop returns to the net for the first time since leaving Dallas' opener with an injury.
message: The Stars lead the NHL in shots per game with 43 (that's a lot). Let's see some of those go in. Here are 5 things to watch for tonight.
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: With Adam Cracknell now in New York, Remi Elie was called up from the Texas Stars.
message: Ben Bishop will get the start in goal tonight, and the Stars will add some youth to the lineup with Honka and Elie.
name: Dallas Stars

message: Julius Honka has the skill and Remi Elie has the grit. Both will be a welcome addition to the lineup against the Red Wings tonight.
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: The 22-year-old appeared in 18 games for Dallas last season, recording seven points.
message: The Dallas Stars have recalled LW Remi Elie from the Texas Stars.
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: Coach Ken Hitchcock sees plenty of positives after first two games, hoping to build on them.
message: Third time's a charm. We're back on home ice tonight at 7:30 to take on the Detroit Red Wings.
name: Dallas Stars

message: Now THIS is how you get around Dallas! 🚁🚁🚁
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: The 2017 first-round pick logged big minutes, tallied a goal and an assist in his first games back from a concussion.
message: He wasn't able to attend Training Camp or compete for a roster spot due to a concussion, but third overall pick Miro Heiskanen is living up to expectations in Finland.
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: Martin Hanzal is probable for Tuesday against Detroit; Dan Hamhuis is a game-time decision.
message: As the Dallas Stars came off the ice after Monday's practice, Adam Cracknell was waiting. There were handshakes and a few hugs.
name: Dallas Stars

message: "We're not the kind of group that's going to bury our heads and get all negative. It's two games."
name: Dallas Stars

message: The New York Rangers have claimed forward Adam Cracknell off waivers.
name: Dallas Stars

message:
Ben Bishop is fine, but the puck he took to the face on Friday night left quite the gash.

PICTURE: bit.ly/2g2DZml
name: Dallas Stars

message: Marc Methot knows to keep things in perspective. With a lot of new guys in the room learning a new system, forming chemistry takes some time.
name: Dallas Stars

caption: nhl.com
description: Yes, it's been a rough start to the season, but once again -- perspective.
message: Spezza: "We're fully committed to playing the way [Hitch] wants us to play the game. We just have to get better at it. It's going to take work in practice."
name: Dallas Stars

message: Klingberg and Janmark had the tallies in this one, but it wasn't enough. We'll head back home to regroup and prepare to host the Red Wings on Tuesday.
name: Dallas Stars

message: Let's get two points on the road. Stars vs. Blues is underway!
name: Dallas Stars
